Title: Architecture 1 Define Project Architecture
Body: Create a high-level architecture diagram and folder structure for the SchoolOS system.

Title: Backend 1 Setup Django and DRF Project
Body: Initialize a new Django REST Framework project with PostgreSQL connection.

Title: Backend 2 Design Database Schema
Body: Design normalized PostgreSQL schema for users roles subjects grades attendance and assignments.

Title: Backend 3 Implement Django Models and Serializers
Body: Create Django models and DRF serializers according to the schema.

Title: Backend 4 Implement Authentication JWT and Roles
Body: Set up JWT authentication and role-based access for Admin Teacher Student Parent.

Title: Backend 5 Implement Grade Calculation Module
Body: Develop percentage-based weighted grade calculation module.

Title: Backend 6 Implement CRUD Endpoints
Body: Add CRUD endpoints for Students Teachers and Subjects.

Title: Backend 7 Generate PDF Reports and Transcripts
Body: Generate PDF grade reports and transcripts using Django templates.

Title: Backend 8 Unit and Integration Tests
Body: Add Pytest tests for backend models views and endpoints with 80 percent coverage.

Title: Backend 9 Write Backend Setup Docs
Body: Document backend environment setup and run instructions in docs BACKEND_SETUP.md.

Title: Frontend 1 Setup React and MUI Project
Body: Initialize React project with Material UI routing and folder structure.

Title: Frontend 2 Implement Login and Role Dashboards
Body: Develop login page and dashboards for Admin Teacher Student Parent roles.

Title: Frontend 3 CRUD Pages Students Teachers Subjects
Body: Create React forms and tables for CRUD operations.

Title: Frontend 4 Grades and Attendance UI
Body: Implement grade input and attendance visualization.

Title: Frontend 5 Charts and Analytics Dashboard
Body: Add charts and KPIs for performance tracking using Recharts.

Title: Frontend 6 Messaging UI In App Email
Body: Develop Gmail style internal messaging UI with mock data.

Title: Frontend 7 API Integration
Body: Connect frontend components to backend REST endpoints via Axios.

Title: Frontend 8 User Interface Testing
Body: Add frontend tests using React Testing Library or Cypress.

Title: Frontend 9 Write Frontend Setup Docs
Body: Document frontend installation and usage in docs FRONTEND_SETUP.md.

Title: Frontend 10 Create User Manual
Body: Write end user guide for Admin Teacher Student Parent roles.

Title: Integration 1 Google OAuth2 Login
Body: Implement Google sign in with OAuth2 tokens and refresh logic.

Title: Integration 2 Google Classroom API
Body: Sync assignments and grades between SchoolOS and Google Classroom API.

Title: Integration 3 Gmail API
Body: Integrate Gmail API for in app messaging between users.

Title: DevOps 1 Dockerize Backend and Frontend
Body: Create Dockerfiles and docker compose for both backend and frontend.

Title: DevOps 2 Setup AWS Environment EC2 RDS S3
Body: Deploy system on AWS with database and file storage configuration.

Title: DevOps 3 Setup CICD Pipeline
Body: Configure GitHub Actions workflow for testing building and deployment.

Title: DevOps 4 Environment Secrets Management
Body: Add env templates and secure credentials handling for all environments.

Title: QA 1 Integration Testing
Body: Write integration tests to validate Google API connections and backend routes.

Title: Docs 1 Deployment Documentation
Body: Write detailed deployment instructions in docs DEPLOYMENT.md.

Title: Architecture 2 Create Project Board
Body: Configure GitHub Project Board with columns Todo In Progress Review Done.

Title: Architecture 3 Setup Issue Templates
Body: Add issue templates for features bugs and documentation.

Title: Architecture 4 Define Reporting Workflow
Body: Document STATUS.md structure and reporting cadence.

Title: Docs 2 Maintain CHANGELOG.md
Body: Track version updates and changes using Semantic Versioning.

Title: QA 2 Final QA and Polishing
Body: Run full regression tests and prepare release candidate build.

Title: DevOps 5 Release Version v1.0.0
Body: Tag final release and deploy production build to AWS.
